define.name: nof_lcplls

define.name: max_nif_rate_per_core

define.name: nof_nif_ports

define.name: nif_interface_id_to_unit_id_granularity

define.name: reassembler_fifo_threshold

value.name: max_phy_id

numeric.doc: Global start TX threshold. This value overrides TX threshold table values

feature.name: reassembler

define.name: nof_phys
define.doc: number of phys supported

define.name: nof_phys_per_core
define.doc: number of phys per core supported

define.name: pm8x50_gen
define.doc: The generation of Blackhalk PM that the device uses. IIf older generation some abilities are not supported

table.name: general
table.doc: general data about phys

table.name: polarity

table.name: core_phys_map
table.doc: map pipeline core to connected PHYs

table.name: vco_div
table.doc: VCO divider per ethu_id

feature.name: is_supported
feature.doc: is device type support ILKN.

feature.name: is_ilu_supported
feature.doc: is device type support data ILKN.

feature.name: credits_selector
feature.doc: is device type support credits source selector.

feature.name: over_fabric_per_core_selector
feature.doc: is device type support over fabric per core selector: nif or fabric.

feature.name: cdu_ilkn_selectors
feature.doc: Indicates if CDU units support Ilkn selectors configuration.

feature.name: clu_ilkn_selectors
feature.doc: Indicates if CLU units support Ilkn selectors configuration.

feature.name: clu_ilkn_direction_selectors
feature.doc: Indicates if CLU units support Ilkn selectors direction (up/down) configuration.

feature.name: support_burst_interleaving
feature.doc: Indicates if Cburst interleaving mode is supported.

feature.name: support_xpmd_if
feature.doc: Indicates if XPMD Interface is supported.

feature.name: support_aligner
feature.doc: Indicates if ILKN aligner is supported.

feature.name: scheduler_context_per_port_support
feature.doc: Indicates if the scheduler supportes per port configuration.

feature.name: support_ilu_burst_max
feature.doc: Indicates if ilu burst max configuration is supported.

feature.name: is_fec_supported
feature.doc: Indicates if device type support FEC over ilkn interface.

feature.name: is_fec_bypass_supported
feature.doc: Indicates if device type support ILKN FEC bypass.

feature.name: fec_units_in_cdu
feature.doc: Indicates if the FEC units are external to core (in CDU).

feature.name: hrf_flush_support
feature.doc: Indicates if HRF flush mechanism is supported

feature.name: elk_require_core_reset_after_link_training
feature.doc: Should ILKN core be reset after link training is performed on ELK port

define.name: ilu_nof

define.doc: Number of ILKN units in the device

define.doc: Number of ILKN Interfaces in each ILKN unit

define.doc: Number of ILKN Interfaces in the device

define.name: fec_units_per_core_nof
define.doc: Number of ILKN FEC units per core in the device

define.name: nof_lanes_per_fec_unit
define.doc: Number of ilkn lanes per ILKN FEC unit in the device

define.name: lanes_max_nof
define.doc: Max number of lanes for ILKN port

define.name: lanes_max_nof_using_fec
define.doc: Max number of lanes for ILKN port interface when FEC is enabled

define.name: lanes_allowed_nof
define.doc: The allowed lanes for each ILKN port

define.name: ilkn_over_eth_pms_max
define.doc: Max number eth pms ilkn lanes is part of

define.name: segments_max_nof
define.doc: Max number of segments in ILKN protocol. (Segment is a resource of ILKN which is shared between all ports of the ILKN unit)

define.name: segments_half_nof
define.doc: Min number of segments in ILKN protocol. (Segment is a resource of ILKN which is shared between all ports of the ILKN unit)

define.name: pms_nof
define.doc: Maximal number of PMs connectted to the ILKN unit

define.name: fmac_bus_size
define.doc: Fabric MAC bus size [bits], relevant for ILKN over fabric ports

define.name: ilkn_rx_hrf_nof

define.name: ilkn_tx_hrf_nof
define.doc: Number of High Rate Fifo queues in TX

define.name: tdm_rx_hrf_size
define.doc: Number of entries in High Rate Fifo for tdm

define.name: tx_hrf_credits

define.name: nof_rx_hrf_per_port
define.doc: Number of High Rate Fifo queues in RX per port

define.doc: Low Watermark value for ILKN ELK

define.name: is_53G_speed_supported
define.doc: Indicated if device supports ILKN with speed of 53125

define.name: is_56G_speed_supported
define.doc: Indicated if device supports ILKN with speed of 56G

define.name: pad_size
define.doc: Packet size for ILKN. Packet will be to this size if packet is smaller than this size

numeric.name: max_nof_ifs
numeric.doc: Max of supported ILKN interfaces, if set to -1, there is no limitation

numeric.name: max_nof_elk_ifs
numeric.doc: Max of supported ILKN interfaces for ELK(KBP), if set to -1, there is no limitation

numeric.name: port_0_status_intr_id
numeric.doc: ILKN port 0 status change interrupt ID

numeric.name: port_1_status_intr_id
numeric.doc: ILKN port 1 status change interrupt ID

table.name: phys
table.doc: phys bitmap for ports added by soc property

value.name: bitmap
value.doc: phys connected to the ILKN id.

value.name: lanes_array
value.doc: lanes connected to the ILKN id.

value.name: array_order_valid
value.doc: indicated weather the lanes_array order is valid or not.

table.name: supported_phys
table.doc: supported phys per ILKN id

value.name: is_supported
value.doc: is ILKN id supported on the device.

value.name: max_phys
value.doc: Max supported phys for the ILKN id.

value.name: nif_phys
value.doc: NIF phys supported by the ILKN id.

value.name: fabric_phys
value.doc: Fabric phys supported by the ILKN id. if the ILKN unit is not connected to fabric lanes, this value should be 0.

table.name: supported_interfaces
table.doc: table with all supported by the device ILKN speeds

value.name: pm_dispatch_type
value.doc: PM type supporting the given speed.

value.name: is_valid
value.doc: Used to filter the valid table entries per device.

table.name: ilkn_cores
table.doc: Ilkn core properties

value.name: fec_disable_by_bypass
value.doc: FEC is disabled by setting FEC bypass

table.name: ilkn_cores_clup_facing
table.doc: Facing clup id per ilkn core (For J2C ILKN Mux)

table.name: supported_device_core
table.doc: supported device core per ILKN id

value.name: core
value.doc: Core id of which ILKN id is associated.

table.name: properties
table.doc: ILKN properties per ILKN id - added using soc property.

value.name: burst_short
value.doc: ILKN burst short value. Sets the smallest burst size for the ILKN port. Shorter bursts will be padded with idles

value.name: burst_max
value.doc: ILKN burst Max value. Set the max burst size for the ILKN port.

value.name: burst_min
value.doc: ILKN burst min value. BurstMin should be bigger or equal to BurstShort and less or equal to BurstMax/2. This value is used to optimize the usage of the interface.

value.name: metaframe_period
value.doc: Specify the interval (in words) between meta-frame sync words. supported values: 64-16K.

value.name: is_over_fabric
value.doc: ILKN over fabric indication. Specify the ILKN port is using Fabric lanes instead of NIF phys.

table.name: nif_pms
table.doc: ILKN PM table over NIF

value.name: nof_phys
value.doc: Number of Phys in ILKN PM

value.name: facing_core_index
value.doc: PM is facing (connected directly) to this core id (For J2C ILKN Mux).

table.name: fabric_pms
table.doc: ILKN PM table over Fabric

value.name: nof_phys
value.doc: Number of Phys in ILKN PM

table.name: ilkn_pms
table.doc: ILKN PM table per ILKN id

value.name: nif_pm_ids
value.doc: ILKN connected PMs on NIF side

value.name: fabric_pm_ids
value.doc: ILKN connected PMs on Fabric side

table.doc: ILKN lanes map table

table.name: fabric_lanes_map
table.doc: ILKN lanes map table

table.name: start_tx_threshold_table
table.doc: TX threshold table of values per speed range

table.name: fec_units
table.doc: mapping lanes to fec units
